name: Virtual Pet Eagle
description:
Meet your high flying new best friend, the Virtual Pet Eagle! This majestic titan of the sky is depending on you to take care of all his needs. You'll have to give him food, brush his feathers, and even soar through the sky to keep your eagle happy!

Get your Virtual Pet Eagle today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Feathery Features
+ INTERACTIVE 3D BALD EAGLE - It's up to you to take care of this beautiful bird!
+ DOZENS OF ACTIVITIES - Keep your new eagle chirping with regular feedings, flying, and lots of petting!
+ FUNNY ACCESSORIES - Give your feathered friend a funny new look with silly hats and sunglasses!
+ BEAUTIFUL ENVIRONMENT - Soar your eagle through the skies of a magical floating island in the sky!
+ HD GRAPHICS - Gorgeous High Definition graphics that look so real you'll fall in love with your new pet at first sight!

Download Virtual Pet Eagle to make a new friend you can bring with you anywhere! It's the perfect pet for any bird lover!
